Game.Risk

Class DataHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.Risk.DataHolder

  • public class DataHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class to hold the entire data set throughout the application.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jay
